document.full_text: hundreds of supporters of a radical muslim egyptian cleric called on the united states to release him in a rare public demonstration by islamists who have become more vocal since president hosni mubarak was ousted.
document.title: egypt islamists demand cleric freed in rare protest
lines_and_colors: hundreds of supporters of a radical muslim egyptian cleric called on the united states to release him in a rare public demonstration by islamists who have become more vocal since president hosni mubarak was ousted.
